opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Pace v. Diguglielmo, Superintendent, State Correctional Institution at Graterford

opinion:
542 U.S. 965

PACE
v.
DiGUGLIELMO, SUPERINTENDENT, STATE CORRECTIONAL INSTITUTION AT GRATERFORD, ET AL.

No. 03-9627.

Supreme Court of United States.

1

C. A. 3d Cir. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted. Reported below: 71 Fed. Appx. 127.
